title: War Dogs. Official Movie Trailer #1 [HD] (2016)

Based on a true story, â€œWar Dogsâ€ follows two friends in their early 20s (Hill and Teller) living in Miami Beach during the Iraq War who exploit a little-known government initiative that allows small businesses to bid on U.S. Military contracts. Starting small, they begin raking in big money and are living the high life. But the pair gets in over their heads when they land a 300 million dollar deal to arm the Afghan Militaryâ€”a deal that puts them in business with some very shady people, not the least of which turns out to be the U.S. Government.
